name: Work-In-Progress
description:
A game in which the unfinished main character has gotten rather tired of how long the devs are taking to actually finish the game and has decided to try and beat their own game sooner rather than later. Some assembly required!

A platformer in which you have to edit pieces of the level in order to get to the end.

A/D to move Left/Right

W/Space bar to Jump

F to toggle Editor Mode

LMB in Editor Mode to select Objects
